testcase.brief: Config "from to" simultaneous policy(from deny, to permit, through MP)
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -Laptop1 has been associated with AP1 and assigned an ip address -Laptop1 uses user-profile "FW"
Test Procedure: 1) Laptop1 and Laptop2 ping each other through MP 2) Configure a ip-policy on MP and bind it to FW: "ip-policy FW" "ip-policy FW from <Laptop1 ip addr> action deny" "ip-policy FW to <Laptop1 ip addr> action permit" "user-profile FW security ip-policy from-access FW to-access FW "ssid <ssid_name> default-user-profile-attr [num]" 3) Repeat step 1

step.console: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-1" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-1 security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}-1" -v "user-profile ${user_id} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "interface wifi1 radio channel 36" -v "clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions"

-v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "security-object ${ssid.name} default-user-profile-attr 1" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-2" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}-2 security-object ${ssid.name}" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}-2" -v "user-profile ${user_id} qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "interface wifi1 radio channel 36" -v "clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions"
-v "_ff id 1 src-ip ${sta2.tif.ip} protocol 1 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log buffered"

step.desc: Configure a ip-policy on MP and bind it to FW: “ip-policy FW” "ip-policy FW from <Laptop1 ip addr> action deny" "ip-policy FW to <Laptop1 ip addr> action permit" "user-profile FW security ip-policy from-access FW to-access FW
step.console: -v "ip-policy ${user_id}" -v "ip-policy ${user_id} id 1 from ${sta1.tif.ip} action deny" -v "ip-policy ${user_id} id 2 to ${sta1.tif.ip} action permit" -v "user-profile ${user_id} security ip-policy from-access ${user_id} to-access ${user_id}" -v "clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions" -v "clear log buffered"

step.log-match: -b "\(\!\) wifi1.1 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${sta2.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -p "ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[egress \(to-air\)\] group \[${user_id}\] id \[1\] \[deny\]" -e "\(i\) wifi1.1 ${sta1.tif.ip}->${sta2.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}

step.desc: clear forwarding-engine ip-sessions clear log buffered

step.log-match: -b "\(o\) wifi1.1 ${sta2.tif.ip}->${sta1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -ps p "ACL: matched upid \[\d+\] dir \[ingress \(from-air\)\] group \[${user_id}\] id \[2\] \[permit\]" -e "\(i\) wifi0.1 ${sta2.tif.ip}->${sta1.tif.ip}\(\d+\) ttl\(\d+\) icmp-echo-req" -f ${log.dir}/${log.file}
